resources.string: Did any activities hinder your sleep?
Length of moderate or vigorous intensity aerobic exercise:
Did your exercises include bone and muscle strengthening?
How long did you engage in relaxation techniques?
For how many hours did you engage in any mindfulness techniques?
For how many hours did you engage in meditation today?
For how many hours did you practice imagination or creativity today?
Rate the amount of time spent socializing in person over social media.
Did you seek assistance and/or debrief when needed?
Did anything prevent your ability to share your thoughts?
Did you engage in more social media than face-to-face socializing?
Did your socializing impact your health or take away from your life balance?
Please answer all of the questions first.
The Acronym for Nurses\' Self Care

SMILES is a self care tool providing a framework that is realistic, applicable, and easily utilized. To support the diversity of the nursing profession. Encouraging a variety of selfenhancing methods to support work/life balance to inspire a continual journey towards a healthy lifestyle.
